divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother saw the object when he arrived home from work last night. it was a very large triangle with white lights at the corners and a single green light in the center. it moved slowly from the north east toward the south west, apparently following a large valley out here in the George Washington National Forest. He called my sister out side to see the thing and tried to get a picture with his I phone and it wouldn't respond? What's great about this is that prior to him getting home I was out side smoking a cigarette and peeing in the bushes. while standing there I was looking in the Woods where the craft would apparently be above later and the words " little green men in the trees " was going through my mind! I am often out side smoking at night and am always looking up, and last night while doing my business, I (WHITH OUT A DOUBT) thought to my self its so over cast I'm not going to bother... :( .
trends: There have been no other sightings in New Castle
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: was large triangular object with thre white lites at the corners and a single green lite in the center. it was verry low and verry large.
